Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Lois J. Reid to reapply for ordinary disability retirement benefits
Summary: Authorizes Lois J. Reid to reapply for ordinary disability retirement benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Lois J. Reid to apply for ordinary disability retirement benefits from the New York state and local employees' retirement system
